text: A person violating a regulation prescribed under this chapter shall be fined under Title 18 or imprisoned for not more than 30 days. A separate violation occurs under this section for each day the violation continues.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., ยง 1-1059.

References in Text

"Title 18," referred to in this section, is Title 18 of the U.S. Code.
